Address.label: Address
Address.value: 581 MAIN STREET,SUITE 810, WOODBRIDGE, New Jersey, 07095, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Northfield Bancorp Inc is the holding company for Northfield Bank. Its subsidiary provides banking services to individuals and corporate customers in Richmond and Kings Counties in New York, and Hunterdon, Mercer, Union and Middlesex counties in New Jersey. The bank attracts deposits and offers credit and other banking services.

value.name: Steven M. Klein
value.title: Chairman, President, Chief Executive Officer & COO
